desc.en: The Game Development Department is in need of assistance. Help them produce a fantastic video game by the deadline!
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is in need of assistance. Help them produce a fantastic video game by the deadline!
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}正在请求协助。必须在限时内做出完美的游戏！

desc.en: The Game Development Department is in danger of getting shut down due to declining membership and performance. Can the ragtag band of gamers come together to make the best video game ever?
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is in danger of getting shut down due to declining membership and performance. Can the ragtag band of gamers come together to make the best video game ever?
desc.zh_cn: {sn千年}的{cn游戏开发部}陷入了废社危机。热爱游戏但成员与实绩都不足的她们，能顺利制作出“神作”吗？

name.en: The Romance of Friendship, Courage, and Light
name.jp: The Romance of Friendship, Courage, and Light
name.zh_cn: 友情与勇气与希望的浪漫

desc.en: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?
desc.jp: The Game Development Department sets their sights on the next Millennium Prize and starts developing a new game. But before long, they are confronted with a sudden crisis unveiling harsh truths. Will they be able to find their happy ending?
desc.zh_cn: {cn游戏开发部}全员为了下一届{sn千年}大赏，开始制作新游戏。但就在这时，学生会长{cf莉央}出现了……被告知的真相与突如其来的危机，{cn游戏开发部}能平安渡过此劫吗？
